The search functionality within the Doxee Platform® Documentation can leverage both traditional search methods and AI-powered chatbot assistance to find the information you need efficiently. Here are some tips to help you get the most out of this feature:

![](data:image/png;base64,)Search bar

- **Search from anywhere**: Use the search bar on the home page or in the left navigation tree, or use the keyboard shortcut **Ctrl+K** to open search from anywhere in Doxee Platform® Documentation.

- **AI Assistance**: Engage with the AI search for conversational queries. Ask questions in natural language, such as “*How do I set up *Workplace* 2?*” and press Enter to receive tailored responses. You can continue to chat with AI Assistance to refine its replies and to get more details about your query.

- **Traditional search**: Use specific keywords related to your query. For example, if you’re looking for installation guides, type “installation guide” or the specific component name.

- **Filters**: Utilize available search filters to narrow down results by category, date, or relevance.

Workplace is a web-based application for executing interactive document workflows, so-called Business Cases. It provides an interface for opening a document template, editing it, and delivering the finished document through various channels.
